dcterms:description: The IMET dataset includes 20,000 textiles spanning from the sixth century BC to the 21st century across various civilizations, used for training models in textile colorway generation.
dcterms:title: IMET dataset

dcterms:description: The Victoria and Albert Museum collections include various textile samples, but specific details about the dataset are not provided.
dcterms:title: Victoria and Albert Museum collections
